tool_description: Our 'Whispers of Love' API enriches digital experiences with random love declarations, fostering meaningful connections and inspiring content creators in French and English
name: Whispers of Love
title: Whispers of Love

api_list.name: love/random-love-fr
api_list.description: To use the "Whispers of Love" send a GET request to the endpoint. This action triggers the API to randomly select a love declaration from its database, returning a heartfelt message that you can use to enhance user interactions or inspire your content.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://whispers-of-love.p.rapidapi.com/love/random-love-fr"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "whispers-of-love.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
